translations: v．拥护，支持，捍卫：为某个观点、原则或人的权益而斗争。
· She championed the cause of the disabled.

phrs.translation: 奥运冠军；奥林匹克冠军

sentences.sentence: He has always championed the cause of gay rights.
sentences.translation: 他一直在为争取同性恋者的权利而斗争。

sentences.sentence: More recently the trend of swapping spaghetti for vegetables has been championed by clean-eating experts.
sentences.translation: 最近，用蔬菜代替意大利面的潮流得到了清洁饮食专家的支持。
